library(ggplot)
library(tidyverse)

# Import table using import feature and copy code 

# Get a count of the total crime 
total_crime <- function to count the total crime in each state

# Make ggplot map from data
ggplot(data = total_crime, 
        mapping = aes(x = long, y = lat,
#          group = group, 
          fill = "density")) +

geom_polygon (color = "gray90", size = 0.1) + coor_map(projection = "albers", lat0 = 39, lat1 = 45) + scale_fill_manual(values = density) +
